item.description:
Five Elements & The Self-Healing Wheel

For a life of health and harmony, the five elements must closely connect with each other and be evenly balanced for unity of body-mind-spirit. In Taoist practice, these elements can be balanced by breath meditation.

The elements of water, wood, fire, metal and earth are also used for healing by diagnosing the excess or deficiency of each element's energetic quality. This diagnostic method is used by many acupuncturists, massage therapists and herbalists practicing traditional Asian medicine.

In SunDo Taoist Yoga, these five elemental energies are stimulated through breathwork and postures. So instead of diagnosis, SunDo practicitoners balance these elements through a holistic practice that refines all energies simultaneously.

In this workshop, you will learn about SunDo postures and discover the relationship between the energy of the lower navel chakra and the energy  of the earth element for grounding. Ruler of the spleen and stomach, the earth element has the most impact on healing the physical body. A chart of the SunDo Self-Healing Wheel will be explained and handouts will be available.


To learn more about this workshop, please visit...


http://www.sundo.org/events/five-elements-workshop/

 

The cost for this workshop is $15. Students are encouraged to bring questions or their previous knowledge and experience in working with healing modalities to further the group's discussion.
item.name: Five Elements Workshop
